column1: #Text=The first line means that the Italian sovereigns are coming back -- they have been to England .
#Text=The second line seems to mean that they enlarged the King at the Italian hospital .
#Text=I Sovrani e le Principessine Reali si attendono a Roma domani alle ore
#Text=Return of the sovereigns to Rome , you see .
#Text=Date of the telegram , Rome , November 24 , ten minutes before twenty-three o'clock .
#Text=The telegram seems to say , “ The Sovereigns and the Royal Children expect themselves at Rome tomorrow at fifty-one minutes after fifteen o'clock . ”
#Text=I do not know about Italian time , but I judge it begins at midnight and runs through the twenty-four hours without breaking bulk .
#Text=In the following ad , the theaters open at half-past twenty .
#Text=If these are not matinees , 20.30 must mean 8.30 P.M. , by my reckoning .
#Text=Compagnia drammatica Drago -- (Ore 20,30) -- LA LEGGE . ALHAMBRA -- (Ore 20,30) -- Spettacolo variato .

#Text=In coda al Direttissimo -- Vedute di Firenze con gran movimeno -- America : Transporto tronchi giganteschi -- I ladri in casa del Diavolo -- Scene comiche . CINEMATOGRAFO -- Via Brunelleschi n. 4 .
#Text=-- Programma straordinario , DON CHISCIOTTE -- Prezzi populari .
#Text=The whole of that is intelligible to me -- and sane and rational , too -- except the remark about the Inauguration of a Russian Cheese .

#Text=This is a four-page paper ; and as it is set in long primer leaded and has a page of advertisements , there is no room for the crimes , disasters , and general sweepings of the outside world -- thanks be ! Today I find only a single importation of the off-color sort :
#Text=Il MATIN ha da Berlino che la principessa Schovenbare-Waldenbure scomparve il 9 novembre .
#Text=Twenty-seven years old , and scomparve -- scampered -- on the 9th November .
#Text=You see by the added detail that she departed with her coachman .
#Text=I hope Sarebbe has not made a mistake , but I am afraid the chances are that she has .
#Text=There are several fires : also a couple of accidents .

#Text=Stammattina , circe le 7,30 , mentre Giuseppe Sciatti , di anni 55 , di Casellina e Torri , passava dal Ponte Vecchio , stando seduto sopra un barroccio carico di verdura , perse l ' equilibrio e cadde al suolo , rimanendo con la gamba destra sotto una ruota del veicolo .
#Text=Lo Sciatti fu subito raccolto da alcuni cittadini , che , per mezzo della pubblica vettura n. 365 , lo transporto a San Giovanni di Dio .
#Text=Ivi il medico di guardia gli riscontro la frattura della gamba destra e alcune lievi escoriazioni giudicandolo guaribile in 50 giorni salvo complicazioni .
#Text=What it seems to say is this : “ Serious Disgrace on the Old Old Bridge .
#Text=This morning about 7.30 , Mr. Joseph Sciatti , aged 55 , of Casellina and Torri , while standing up in a sitting posture on top of a carico barrow of vedure ( foliage ?
#Text=hay ? vegetables ? ) , lost his equilibrium and fell on himself , arriving with his left leg under one of the wheels of the vehicle .
#Text=“ Said Sciatti was suddenly harvested ( gathered in ? ) by several citizens , who by means of public cab No. 365 transported him to St. John of God . ”

#Text=Paragraph No. 3 is a little obscure , but I think it says that the medico set the broken left leg -- right enough , since there was nothing the matter with the other one -- and that several are encouraged to hope that fifty days well fetch him around in quite giudicandolo-guaribile way , if no complications intervene .
#Text=I am sure I hope so myself .
#Text=There is a great and peculiar charm about reading news-scraps in a language which you are not acquainted with -- the charm that always goes with the mysterious and the uncertain .

#Text=You can never be absolutely sure of the meaning of anything you read in such circumstances ; you are chasing an alert and gamy riddle all the time , and the baffling turns and dodges of the prey make the life of the hunt .

#Text=Sometimes a single word of doubtful purport will cast a veil of dreamy and golden uncertainty over a whole paragraph of cold and practical certainties , and leave steeped in a haunting and adorable mystery an incident which had been vulgar and commonplace but for that benefaction .
#Text=Would you be wise to draw a dictionary on that gracious word ? would you be properly grateful ?
#Text=After a couple of days ' rest I now come back to my subject and seek a case in point .
#Text=I find it without trouble , in the morning paper ; a cablegram from Chicago and Indiana by way of Paris .
#Text=All the words save one are guessable by a person ignorant of Italian :

#Text=Il guardiano del teatro dell'opera di Walace ( Indiana ) , avendo voluto espellare uno spettatore che continuava a fumare malgrado il diviety , questo spalleggiato dai suoi amici tir`o diversi colpi di rivoltella .
#Text=Il guardiano ripose . Nacque una scarica generale .

#Text=has from Chicago : The cop of the theater of the opera of Wallace , Indiana , had willed to expel a spectator which continued to smoke in spite of the prohibition , who , spalleggiato by his friends , tire ( Fr . Tire , Anglice Pulled ) manifold revolver-shots ; great panic among the spectators .
